review_data.title: A most enjoyable pizzeria

review_data.title: Good quality of food but rather standard dishes
review_data.content: Good Italian restaurant close to the city center. They serve pizza, pasta and other (quite standard) Italian dishes. No exiting surprises on the menu. I had just a spaghetti Carbonara which was more than enough after the nice bread (from pizza dough) you get to...More

review_data.title: supper at Molino
review_data.content: We had two large portions - a huge calzone - it was recommended as the house specialty - and rightly so - and a pasta. Both were very good! Before getting the meal we got two different pieces of fresh bread (one of them with...More

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnete Pizzas, traumhaftes Tiramisu
review_data.content: Wir möchten Molino am Stauffacher für das exzellente Service und ihre Pizza Vegetariana, die guten Salate, sowie auch das frische...More
